text: @realDonaldTrump @realDonaldTrump, no matter what rationalization, deflection, lies and revisions about COVID-19 response, truth is played before our very eyes- number of infected indiv, number of deaths, heroic accounts of MDs/nurses, struggles of state governors to find PPE’s/ ventilators!
